mapper.select: SELECT left(sido_code,2) as sidoCode, sido_name as sidoName FROM sidocode ORDER BY sido_code
SELECT left(gugun_code,5) as gugunCode, gugun_name as gugunName FROM guguncode where left(gugun_code,2) = #{sido} ORDER BY gugun_code
SELECT distinct dong, code FROM houseinfo where code = #{gugun} ORDER BY dong

SELECT DISTINCT i.no as no, i.dong as dong, i.AptName as aptName, i.code as code, i.jibun as jibun, i.lat as lat, i.lng as lng, d.dealAmount as dealAmount, d.buildYear as buildYear, d.dealYear as dealYear, d.area as area FROM houseinfo i join housedeal d ON i.dong = d.dong and i.AptName = d.AptName WHERE dong = #{dong} GROUP BY AptName

SELECT DISTINCT i.no as no, i.dong as dong, i.AptName as aptName, i.code as code, i.jibun as jibun, i.lat as lat, i.lng as lng, d.dealAmount as dealAmount, d.buildYear as buildYear, d.dealYear as dealYear, d.area as area FROM houseinfo i join housedeal d ON i.dong = d.dong and i.AptName = d.AptName WHERE AptName like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') GROUP BY AptName
